export const formatDate=dateString=>{const date=new Date(dateString);return date.toLocaleString('zh-CN',{year:'numeric',month:'2-digit',day:'2-digit',hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'});};// 获取课程状态

export const getAssignmentStatus=assignment=>{const now=new Date();const dueDate=new Date(assignment.due_date);return now>dueDate?'inactive':'active';};
